```
globe = createShape(SPHERE, 100);  // 100 is the size of the sphere
```

```
translate (x, y, z);
globe.rotateY(radians(0.5));  // rotateY function is a part of PShape
shape(globe);                 // This displays the shape in the window
```

```
pushMatrix();            // Save 
rotate(PI);              // Rotate 
image (prop, 0, 0);      // Draw 
popMatrix();             // Restore
```
